snippet: Apps have become vital in marketing mobile technologies to consumers, and the allegiance of app developers to Apple has helped propel the success of its devices.
abstract: Apps have become vital in marketing mobile technologies to consumers and the allegiance of app developers to Apple has helped propel the success of its devices, even as smartphones running Google's Android operating system outsell iPhones more than two to one; Apple will seek to strengthen its ties to mobile developers with a series of product announcements at its developer conference in San Francisco.

byline.original: By NICK WINGFIELD and BRIAN X. CHEN

lead_paragraph: Apps have become vital in marketing mobile technologies to consumers, and the allegiance of app developers to Apple has helped propel the success of its devices.

headline.seo: Apple Keeps Loyalty of Mobile App Developers
headline.main: Google Outsells, but Apple Cultivates Loyalty of App Developers
headline.print_headline: Android Outsells, but Apple Cultivates Loyalty of App Developers
